repnme.cdata!:
Papua New Guinea - Second
            Telecommunications Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The project forms the major part of P
            & T's FY 1973-75 telecommunications development
            program and includes the provision of: local automatic
            exchange cable network and telephone equipment; UHF/VHF
            radio systems; multiplex equipment; long distance automatic
            exchanges; telex exchanges and teleprinters; technical and
            operations building. Engineering consultants will help P
            & T with bidding and procurement.
